name: ext_R4_ExplanationOfBenefit_benefitBalance
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ExplanationOfBenefit.benefitBalance for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.benefitBalance from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.
